title: IFace2.AttachSurface
description: Attaches a surface to this face.
signature:
System.Boolean AttachSurface( 
   Surface
SurfIn
,
   System.Boolean
SenseIn
)

parameters.name: SenseIn
parameters.description: True if surface normal and face normal are in the same direction, false if surface normal and face normal are in opposite direction

returns: True if surface is attached to face, false if not
remarks:
To detach surfaces from faces, use
IFace2::DetachSurface
. Neither IFace2::AttachSurface nor IFace2::DetachSurface affect body topology.
